text: Mu by’ukuri ba bandi bahakanye bakanakumira (abantu kuyoboka) inzira ya Allah no kugana ku Musigiti Mutagatifu twashyiriyeho abantu bose mu buryo bureshya; baba abawuturiye cyangwa abawugenderera (tuzabahanisha ibihano bihambaye). N’uzashaka kuwukoreramo ikibi icyo ari cyo cyose, tuzamusogongeza ku bihano bibabaza
